text: <!here|@here> i didn't wanna ping anyone late night but with the sun out again, thought i'd ensure everyone saw the :arrow_up: novel/project update.
appreciate you keeping us in the loop on things :slightly_smiling_face:
hey <@U0XJFPSRL> and <@U0HP6TFNX> I know y'all have seen the wires for this.  I dug up some limited context about them:

How “done” is the UX?
Jackson said it is based on uninformed hypothesis (some context from Alexa)
No copywriter has been involved, as copy is FPO
Interactions themselves are a reasonable first draft, but not far beyond that
They want to get more minds on this that have been through this type of product development before. Want to essentially audit the existing UX and help them understand how much changing it needs.

hey team, I'm working on a schedule now and Avery is taking another scope/legal call at 2:30 to lock in the aforementioned plan.  I'l share out soon.  In the mean time wanted to remind everyne of how team composition is shaping up.  

Dennis: Production Lead
Mean, Ivan: Design Leads
Dimitry: Tech Lead
Elise: UX Design
Ali G: Viz Design
Cara (TBC, Contractor) Writer and Strategist
John C: Extra dev hands

To all those others who we briefed, we’d still like to include ya in the Semio session and hear any thoughts or questions ya have but at this point the project likely doesn’t dictate additional design or dev team members.  

For those still on Assist, also, feel free to leave the 3.0 channel as it's running in parallel.  Keeping context btween the two will be coordinated with the Product Partner team and I
just clearing up some communication lines, nothing personal, folks!
Project is a go! Team re-brief to discuss all of the above booked for tomorrow. Special guest appearance from our writer, Cara!
